item.title: Simpleshare

item.title: PeopleDB
item.description: Github Repo Person Database using python, flask, sqlite3, react. Home / Search page Detailed info / modify/delete page Create new user page Installing Install deps from pkg manager Ubuntu: $ sudo apt install python3 python3-pip sqlite3 nodejs npm Arch: $ sudo pacman -S sqlite3 nodejs npm python3 python3-pip Install python pip pkgs $ sudo pip3 install flask flask-cors pysqlite3 Clone this repo $ git clone https://github.
